com.waes.scalableWeb.common

Class JsonManipulationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.waes.scalableWeb.common.JsonManipulationManager

  • @Component
public class JsonManipulationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0.0 JsonManipulationManager class is in charge of all the processing of the Json files Save, Comparing, generating the diff file, persist the Json and create a response of type Json for the controller
    Author:
    Katherine Alfaro

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonManipulationManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String compareJson()
      Compares and creates the diff file for the input Jsons
      java.lang.String getJsonStyleResponse(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String description)
      Process the response string to return it in Json format
      JsonDiff persistJason(int id)
      Creates the entity with the diff file created on compareJson() so it can be persisted by the repo in the service It throws a custom Exception to specify that you need 2 Json inputs for the comparator to work
      void saveJson(java.lang.String json, java.lang.String side)
      Saves the input Jsons in memory (not in H2)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
